column1: Table 5.31: Livelihood challenges and community expectations

column2: Animal damages for crops,obtaining high-quality seeds,lack of knowledge about modern agricultural technology,lack of packaging materials for the products/harvest, land problems, marketing problems like price issues, High input cost
column3: Solutions for the animal damages: electric fences,awareness programs about moderns' agriculture technology,access to high-quality seeds,access to the packaging materials ,solutions for land allocation issues , facilitate market access
